word: God will help us if we take hold of the help He has provided. "Let him take hold of My strength," He says, "that he may make peace with Me, and he shall make peace with Me" [Isaiah 27:5]. This is a blessed promise. Many times, when I have been discouraged and almost in despair, I have come to the Lord with this promise, and said, "Let me take hold of Thy strength, that I may make peace with Thee; and I shall make peace with Thee." And as I have laid hold of the strength of God, I have found a peace which passeth understanding.
